message.title: Hello!
message.line1: Let's test the application in Bitrix24. Open the application in the slider.
Open each page in the left menu and explore how everything works on it.
message.line2: Don't forget to play with the color mode.

message.line1: These are key markers for identifying, controlling, and diagnosing the application.

seo.title: License and payment
seo.description: Designation of the tariff plan with the region specified as a prefix.

message.line1: You can notify the user in advance about the upcoming renewal date.
message.license: tariff designation with the region specified as a prefix
message.licenseType: internal tariff designation without the region specified
message.licenseFamily: tariff designation without the region specified
message.isSelfHosted: flag indicating whether Bitrix24 is the on-premise or cloud version
message.isExpired: flag indicating whether the paid or trial period has expired
message.days: number of days remaining until the end of the paid period or trial period

message.line1: This shows the operation of methods available in the application embedded via Frame.
message.makeImCallToVideoDescription: use `$b24.parent.imCallTo(xxx, true)` to initiate a call
message.makeImCallToVoiceDescription: use `$b24.parent.imCallTo(xxx, false)` to initiate a call
message.makeImOpenMessengerDescription: use `$b24.parent.imOpenMessenger` to open the chat window
message.makeImOpenHistoryDescription: use `$b24.parent.imOpenHistory` to open the chat history

error.emptyNumber: Phone number for call is not specified.

seo.title: Specific parameters
seo.description: List of specific parameters for the on-premise and cloud versions.

message.line1: There are several differences between the on-premise and cloud versions of Bitrix24.
message.isSelfHosted: flag indicating whether Bitrix24 is the on-premise or cloud version

seo.title: I18n
seo.description: Demonstrates the output of language messages depending on the Bitrix24 locale.

seo.title: Feedback form
seo.description: Examples of fields for the feedback form.

message.line1: You can embed a CRM form from your Bitrix24 into the application and pass special fields to it.
message.line2: When the user fills out the form, data about the application, tariff, etc. will be available in your Bitrix24.
message.payment_expired: flag indicating whether the paid or trial period has expired
message.days: number of days remaining until the end of the paid period or trial period
message.b24_plan: tariff designation with the region specified as a prefix

message.line1: Displaying a formatted amount is very easy.

message1: The early bird catches the worm
message2: Seeing once is better than hearing a hundred times
